extras: Capstone project with Lockheed Martin analyzing supply chain risks using Spacy for natural language processing and PyTorch to fine-tune Hugging Face transformer models. Models were handed off for use by the Lockheed Martin team at the end of the project.

degree: B.Sc. (Hons) in Computing Science and Mathematics
extras: Included a year-long student exchange at the University of Warwick in the UK.

Dissertation [*Automated Data Collection Using Spatial Relationship Detection in Videos*](https://github.com/martin-bartolo/spatial-relationship-detection-bsc-final-year-project/blob/master/Short-Review-Paper.pdf) (A grade) in which I developed a system that could analyze videos and find the spatial relationships between identified objects in each frame.
